None.Name: Blessed Glacial
None.Description: Every friendly Ice Shield in the current game will immediately restore 650 life points. What is more, the duration of affected Ice Shields is extended by the continuance of this spell. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 35 seconds.
